verses.verse: At that time <WH6256>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, they shall bring out <WH3318> the bones <WH6106> of the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and the bones <WH6106> of his princes <WH8269>, and the bones <WH6106> of the priests <WH3548>, and the bones <WH6106> of the prophets <WH5030>, and the bones <WH6106> of the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, out of their graves <WH6913>;
